snippet: JURDEM--Arnold I.,90, of New York, N.Y. died February 29 of sudden heart failure. He was born July 21, 1925 in Bronx, New York, the son of Louis and Frances Jurdem. A Public relations professional for over fifty years Mr. Jurdem worked with a wide variety of corporate and fashion clients. His wife Ann, son Laurence, daughter Deanne and daughter-in-law Jorie survive him. Mr. Jurdem was a member of New York's Metropolitan Club and enjoyed fine food and the performing arts. He was the center of our family and he will be deeply missed. Funeral services will be held on Friday at 9:30am at Frank E. Campbell "The Funeral Chapel," 81st Street and Madison Avenue. Interment to follow at Salem Fields Cemetery, Brooklyn, NY. 1/3
